entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023
